content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future strategies of other music companies. However, it is worth noting that the music industry is constantly changing and adapting to new technologies, trends, and consumer preferences. By diversifying its offerings, Universal Music Group has been able to position itself as a leader in the industry and stay ahead of the curve. It's possible that other music companies may follow suit and look for opportunities to expand their services beyond music. However, it's also possible that other companies may choose to focus specifically on music and build their businesses around that core offering. Ultimately, it will depend on individual company strategies and market conditions.
